title: Robot Santa: The Further Adventures of Santa's Twin
description: In this sequel to Santa’s Twin, Santa’s brother Bob has worked hard to prove himself to his brother and gain his trust after the kidnapping drama of the previous year, but when Bob’s newest creation of a robot Santa gets a screw loose and goes crazy, Bob knows he’ll be in big trouble if he doesn’t get it under control before the big night.
author: Dean Koontz
